execution_plan.description: Find the goods id(s) that have the maximum price (the most expensive item(s)).
execution_plan.query: SELECT id, price FROM goods WHERE price = (SELECT MAX(price) FROM goods);

execution_plan.description: Find the receipt id(s) that include the most expensive goods found in step 1.
execution_plan.query: SELECT Receipt, Item FROM items WHERE Item IN ($step1.id);

execution_plan.description: Retrieve the receipt number and date for the receipt(s) identified in step 2.
execution_plan.query: SELECT ReceiptNumber, Date FROM receipts WHERE ReceiptNumber IN ($step2.Receipt);
